Class ScriptManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.script.ScriptManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ScriptManager
extends Object
implements FileWatcher, Serializable
    Manages the scripts use by the Configuration.
